Package com.mimecast.robin.mx.client

Class OkHttpsPolicyClient

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.config.ConfigHandler
com.mimecast.robin.mx.client.OkHttpsPolicyClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpsPolicyClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
FailingHttpsPolicyClient, LocalHttpsPolicyClient
public class OkHttpsPolicyClient extends ConfigHandler implements HttpsPolicyClient
OK HTTPS Policy Client.

HTTPS client implementation specific for MTA-STS.

  • Method Details

    • getPolicy

      public OkHttpsResponse getPolicy(StsRecord stsRecord, int maxPolicyBodySize) throws PolicyWebPKIInvalidException, PolicyFetchErrorException
      Gets policy.

      Requires a fresh StsRecord instance to get the domain from and construct the StsPolicy instance.

      Will only return valid and not expired policies.

      Specified by:
      getPolicy in interface HttpsPolicyClient
      Parameters:
      stsRecord - StsRecord instance.
      maxPolicyBodySize - The maximum size of the policy body.
      Returns:
      OkHttpsResponse instance.
      Throws:
      PolicyWebPKIInvalidException - Policy web PKI invalid exception.
      PolicyFetchErrorException - Policy fetch error exception.
